You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &pr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Pr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2abb/index.htm U+02ABB].
  * `&pr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/227a/index.htm U+0227A].
